english_translation: As the sun sets in the west during the evening,
The full moon rises in the east.

kannada_original: ತಿಂಗಳಿನ ಈ ನೋಟ ಯಾರು ತಂದರೊ ಇಲ್ಲಿ !
english_transliteration: Tiṁgaḷina ī nōṭa yāru tandaro illi !
english_translation: Who brought this sight of the moon here!

kannada_original: ಶಶಿಗೆ ಸಖ ಈ ಸೂರ - ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ.
english_transliteration: Śaśige sakha ī sūra - Muddu Rāma.
english_translation: This sun is a friend to the moon - Dear Rāma.
